item.title: ExplainSpeaking: Why trading with China, as against the US, poses more challenges for India
item.dc:creator: Udit Misra

media:content.media:title: CHART 3, for instance, shows that as of 2020 China manufacturers more than the next 10 countries.

CHART 4 shows how China’s share in global manufacturing compares with countries such as the US and India. In terms of gross production, China accounts for 35% of the total global output while the US is almost one-third of it at 12% and India is one-twelfth of it at 3%.
